40035000.Original_Text: (세상에... 이 길의 이름이\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>거미 숲 길</>인 이유를 알겠군)
40035000.English_Text:
(Oh my God... I can see why this road is called
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Spider Forest Road</>)
40035000.Chinese_Text:
(我的天……我明白这条路为什么叫
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>蜘蛛林路</>了)

40035001.Original_Text: (역시, <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>반달 호수</>와는\n사뭇 다른 분위기인걸?\n다음 탐사 대상을 찾아볼까)
40035001.English_Text:
(After all, <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Half Moon Lake</>
Is it a different atmosphere?
Shall we find the next exploration target)
40035001.Chinese_Text:
(果然是
与<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>半月湖</>完全不同的气氛?
要不要找到下一个探索目标?)

40035002.English_Text:
(<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Ecological forest</> is...
I hope that <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Verginal verse</> Is it because?
Let's take a closer look!)
40035002.Chinese_Text:
(说<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>生态林</>……
是不是因为那个<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>诗</>?
我们仔细看看吧!)

40035003.English_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Erosted Ancient Myomyeon</>... 
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Sea Moon Continent</> >not even <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>cracks</> seem 
safe)

40035004.English_Text:
(A very menacing horn.
The target for this expedition is
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Antler</>)
40035004.Chinese_Text:
(这是一个非常有威胁的角.
这次探索的目标是
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>鹿角</>)

40035005.English_Text:
(<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Green Horn Forest</>
I think I've looked around enough)
40035005.Chinese_Text:
(我想我已经为<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>绿角森林</>环顾了足够的
)

40035006.English_Text:
(This is almost a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>mandala flower</> field.
Then this expedition is!)
40035006.Chinese_Text:
(这差不多是<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>曼陀罗花</>场.
那么,这次远征!)

40035007.Chinese_Text:
(Yongkedo <textColor=[215:94:94:255]> 曼陀罗花</> 你正在经历
 尖叫声...)

40035008.Original_Text: (오호, 물이 얕아 충분히 \n건널 수 있겠는데? \n저 반대편 해변도 살펴보자!)
40035008.English_Text:
(Oh, the water is shallow enough 
You can cross it? 
Let's check the other side of the beach too!)
40035008.Chinese_Text:
(哦,水够浅 
 能过吗?
 去海滩的另一边看看吧!)

40035009.Chinese_Text:
(<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>沙质河口与
和</>类似的气氛)

40035010.English_Text:
(<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Are you here to inspect
the abandoned watchtower</>?)
40035010.Chinese_Text:
(你是来检查
废弃的瞭望塔</>的吗?)

40035011.English_Text:
(These are the first ones I've seen. 
It would be a good target for exploration)
40035011.Chinese_Text:
(这是我第一次看到的.
我认为它们适合探索.)

40035012.English_Text: (Huh, he was such a creepy guy that I really got goosebumps)
40035012.Chinese_Text: (嗯,他是个可怕的家伙,我真的起鸡皮疙瘩了)

40035013.English_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>crocodiles</> and 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>hermit crab</> live on this shore)

40035014.English_Text:
(The ship broke, and the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>spears</>
have lost their way?)

40035016.English_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Soldiers</> who came with you.
May everyone sleep peacefully...)
40035016.Chinese_Text:
(和他们一起来的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>士兵</>.
愿大家安睡......)

40035018.English_Text:
(<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Just before the base</> <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Burn</>>.
Pay attention to defense I'll write it)
40035018.Chinese_Text:
(<textColor=[110:216:175:255]> 就在基地前面 </> <textColor=[215:94:94:255]> 一燃烧 </>. 
 我要注意防御)

40035019.English_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Bloodplate</>la...
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blue Man</> gang.
Let's examine it in detail)

40035020.English_Text:
(The other half of the forest was occupied by 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Wolf</>)

40035022.English_Text: (Whew, I would have been very embarrassed if I didn't know it was <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Welcome</>)
40035022.Chinese_Text:
(呵呵,如果你不知道是<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>欢迎</>,
你会很尴尬的)

40035023.English_Text:
(This is 
this is what <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Illustrated Human Insect</> really looks like? 
Okay, let's start exploring!)
40035023.Chinese_Text:
(这是<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>迎宾</>的
真面目?
好,开始探索吧!)

40035024.English_Text:
(Phew, <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Drying Swamp</>
I think I've looked around enough)
40035024.Chinese_Text:
(呵呵,我想我已经看够了
够<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>干湿地</>)

40035025.English_Text:
(This <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Club</> has been 
occupied by the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Westerns</>. 
Let's start exploring)
40035025.Chinese_Text:
(这个<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>殖民地</>已经被<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>西方人</>占领了.
开始探索吧)

40035028.English_Text:
(...this is where 
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>the early pioneers</> are buried
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>The Spirit Cemetery</>Logguna)
40035028.Chinese_Text:
(...这是
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>早期开拓者</>埋葬的地方.

40035029.English_Text:
(These are <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Weeping</>?
What are you doing here?)
40035029.Chinese_Text:
(这些是<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>suyang</>吧?
他们在这里做什么?)

40035030.Chinese_Text:
(参考<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>森林</>探索,
这个就够了)

40035031.Chinese_Text:
(行走的……植物?
这次探险的目标是
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>人参</>)

40035032.English_Text:
(<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Sun and Moon Continent</> has quite a few ancient
remains)
40035032.Chinese_Text:
(<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>日月大陆</>上有不少古代
的痕迹)

40035034.Original_Text: (개울가에 모여 사는 건 \n구릉 위에 출몰하는 \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>낙원 대성</> 때문이겠지?)
40035034.English_Text:
(The reason we live together by the creek is because 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Paradise Daeseong</> haunts on the hills, right?)
40035034.Chinese_Text:
(我们住在溪边附近的原因可能是因为
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>天堂的大城</>出没在山上?)

40035035.English_Text: (Oh, there are a lot of cute guys on this beach)
40035035.Chinese_Text:
(哦,这个沙滩上有很多
可爱的家伙)

40035036.English_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Dim</> is <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Half Moon Lake</>
<textColor=[ 215:94:94:255]>looks like a goblin</>)

40035038.Chinese_Text:
(这个<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>泥泞地带</>有很多
凶猛的生物)

40035039.English_Text:
(<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Sunrise Ramp</> seems to be the domain of 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Myomyeon</>. 
Let's take a look around)
40035039.Chinese_Text:
(<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>日出坡</>好像是
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Myomyeon</>的领域.
我们来看看吧)

40035040.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Myomyeon</> are wary and hostile to humans...)
40035040.Chinese_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>妙面和</>都对
心存戒备,对人类怀有敌意……)

40035041.English_Text:
(Ugh... <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Since the verse</>, 
not smelling grass, but rather a rotten smell 
vibrating)
40035041.Chinese_Text:
(呃……因为<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>诗</>
腐臭味,远离青草味,
震动)

40035042.English_Text:
(Creatures from hillside have gathered to avoid
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Essay</>)
40035042.Chinese_Text:
(山坡上的生物正在聚集以避免
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>坐</>)

40035043.Chinese_Text:
(大吃一惊!
真的好大的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>三明亭</>!)

40035044.English_Text:
(Isn't that <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Metallurgy</> on the waterside?
It looks a little different)
40035044.Chinese_Text:
(那是不是在水边的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>冶金</>?
看起来有点不一样)

40035045.Original_Text: (강하고 난폭하네. \n이 정도면 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>폭포 남부 숲</>은 \n충분히 둘러본 것 같아)
40035045.English_Text:
(Strong and violent. 
I think that's enough for <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>The Forest South of the Falls</>
I've looked around enough)
40035045.Chinese_Text:
(又猛又猛.
如果够了,<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>瀑布南边的森林</>我想我已经看过
够了)

40035046.English_Text:
(Dark mist is
mystical <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Highland</>.
Let's take a look around)

40035047.English_Text:
(For what purpose did you come to
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Highlands</>?)

40035048.English_Text:
(If this is enough, I think I've looked around at <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Taerokrim</>
at a glance)
40035048.Chinese_Text:
(如果够了,我想我已经回顾了<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Taerokrim </>和
.)

40035050.English_Text:
(It was a dark and damp swamp
to a thick fog...
It was a shady forest)
40035050.Chinese_Text:
(从阴暗潮湿的沼泽到
浓雾……
是一片阴森森的森林)

40035051.English_Text:
(Oh, definitely different from <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Soowol Plains</>
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Wolf</> Yes.
Let's take a closer look!)
40035051.Chinese_Text:
(哦,肯定和<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>水月平原</>的
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>狼</>不一样.让我们仔细看看
!)

40035052.English_Text:
(Wow, there was a nice beach like this here.
Shall we start exploring?)
40035052.Chinese_Text:
(哇,这里
有一个很棒的海滩.
我们要开始探索吗?)

40035053.English_Text:
(You attack living beings 
indiscriminately. 
Let's go up the hill as well)
40035053.Chinese_Text:
(1) 他们不分青红皂白地攻击众生.
我们上山吧.)

40035054.English_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Neighboring creatures</>Would you like to look
more?)
40035054.Chinese_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>我们是否应该仔细看看周围的生物</>也
?)

40035055.English_Text:
(If you look at it from a distance,
It looks like a kite swaying in the wind)
40035055.Chinese_Text:
(再往远处看,
看起来像在风中摇曳的馒头)

40035057.English_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>You're Dark</>
You're so playful. Huh? Over there!)

40035059.English_Text:
(...I was a sailor on a wrecked ship.
Then those <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Witches</>...)
40035059.Chinese_Text:
(……我是一艘失事船上的水手.
然后,那些<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>女孩</>……)

40035060.English_Text:
(Phew, they are smart guys.
Oh my gosh! Over there <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Burn up</>, right?!)
40035060.Chinese_Text:
(呵呵,他们是强者.
天啊!那边<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>我们烧吧</>吧?!)

40035061.English_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blood Plague</> seems to have 
made this forest their home)
40035061.Chinese_Text:
(看来是<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>血</>把这片森林
变成了基地)

40035062.English_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Red plum</> and <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Ho-Ryong Kwak</>? 
<textColor=[215 :94:94:255]>Let's investigate
with the surrounding creatures</>)
40035062.Chinese_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>红梅</>和<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>荷龙国</>?
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>让我们和周围的生物一起调查
</>)

40035063.Original_Text: (...<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>환영 인면충</>이 날 \n모방하진 않았으면 좋겠어.\n주변을 좀 더 둘러볼까?)
40035063.English_Text:
(...<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Welcome Human Insect</>I hope you don't 
Imitate this day.
Shall we look around a bit more?)
40035063.Chinese_Text:
(...<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>欢迎昆虫昆虫</>今天
希望你不要模仿它.
我们要多看看吗?)

40035064.English_Text:
(Those weird things...
Are they supposed to be plants?)
40035064.Chinese_Text:
(那些奇怪的东西……
应该是植物吧?)

40035065.English_Text:
(Are you sure you're not trying to 
rob <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Soul Graveyard</>...?
Let's go inside)
40035065.Chinese_Text:
(不是应该
抢<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>灵的墓地吗?……?
进去吧)

40035066.Chinese_Text:
(放弃使命
满足自身利益……)

40035067.English_Text:
(Phew, it was hard.
Sometimes I see <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Myomyeon</>)
40035067.Chinese_Text:
(嗯,好难.
我也能看到<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>妙面蕙</>)

40035068.Original_Text: (구릉 옆 개울을 따라 \n다양한 생물이 살고 있네. \n한번 둘러볼까?)
40035068.English_Text:
(There are various creatures living along the creek next to the hill. 
Shall we take a look around?)
40035068.Chinese_Text:
(
 小山旁边的小溪里有各种各样的生物.
 我们要不要四处看看?)

40035069.English_Text:
(Your cute looks 
If you're vigilant, you'll get in trouble)
40035069.Chinese_Text:
(可爱的外表
一不小心就会惹上麻烦)

40035070.English_Text:
(The road is complicated and dark
There must be a lot of people wandering...)
40035070.Chinese_Text:
(因为路很复杂很黑
肯定有很多人在徘徊……)

40035071.English_Text:
(Oh! There's also a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Myomyeon</> with a bow and 
shield over there!)
40035071.Chinese_Text:
(哦!那边还有一个<textColor=[215:94:94:255]> Myomyeon </> 带着弓和
盾!)

40035072.English_Text:
(It seems to have improved a bit.
Let's take a look inside too)
40035072.Chinese_Text:
(好像进步了一点.
进去看看吧.)

40035073.Original_Text: (이 숲에도 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>시귀</>가…\n개척에 큰 희생이 따랐다는\n사실은 알고 있었지만…)
40035073.English_Text:
(Even in this forest, there is <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>verse </>...
I knew that pioneering took a lot of sacrifice
but I knew...)
40035073.Chinese_Text:
(即使在这片森林里,我也知道<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>诗</>……的
事实.

40035074.English_Text:
(Ummm?! They're 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Black Dawn</>?
Let's take a closer look!)
40035074.Chinese_Text:
(嗯?!难怪是
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>黑色黎明</>?
让我们仔细看看!)

40035075.Chinese_Text:
(那个<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>雷克顿</>真的很大.
一起来看看吧!)

40035076.English_Text:
(<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Go down the hill</>
Would you like to find the next destination?)
40035076.Chinese_Text:
(<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>下山</> 
我们要不要找到下一个探索目标?)

40035077.English_Text:
(Those guys look very
hard?
Let's take a closer look)
40035077.Chinese_Text:
(那些家伙看起来很努力
?
让我们仔细看看)
